abstract: Bunge, the agribusiness company, said Wednesday that it was selling its fertilizer nutrient assets in Brazil to the mining giant Vale for $3.8 billion.
snippet: Bunge, the agribusiness company, said Wednesday that it was selling its fertilizer nutrient assets in Brazil to the mining giant Vale for $3.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Bunge, the agribusiness company, said Wednesday that it was selling its fertilizer nutrient assets in Brazil to the mining giant Vale for $3.8 billion.

headline.main: Vale Buys Bunge Fertilizer Unit for $3.8 Billion
